_sText:
Hey guys this is my new map, "bc_ghostpipes". It is a small snow map with many hills and mounds to climb on or you can go down low to attack for some CQB action. There is also the "ghost pipe" as I like to call it, which is invisible to the naked eye until you are inside it. You can swim through it to get to the other side of the map.

UPDATE: 3:56 P.M. 2/4/2012:
I added some walls, adjusted the lighting, and reduced the amount of ghost pipes to only 1 ghost pipe. You can find it behind 2 half-buried crates in each spawn.
_______________________________

Please have fun, and give me feedback on what you want me to add or remove from this map! 

Thanks for everyone who sees this page.
